writer.name: 诺尔·亚历杭德罗 Noel Alejandro

director.name: 诺尔·亚历杭德罗 Noel Alejandro

trans_title: 床边故事：舒伯特音乐会
introduction: With the party on its last legs, a group of friends linger in the living room. A grating tune on the piano interrupts the foreplay between Caleb, Tomas and Marc, but soon, the notes somehow start falling into place as a soothing Schubert melody. The three friends stare quietly, or maybe defiantly, at the source of the music. When the piano stops, the real action begins on the couch. This poetic tale of hedonism in tumultuous times is the second chapter of Raid, a four-part series featuring interwoven stories in a reality that's equally dreamy and radically mundane. —Noel Alejandro
chinese_title: 床边故事：舒伯特音乐会
